channel.description: Containers Review Questions Q. Rootless containers are less secure than rootful containers. True or False? A. False. Q. Which of these—isolation, security, high transition time, less overhead—is not a benefit of the container technology? A. High transition time is not a container benefit. Q. What is the name and location of the system-wide file that stores a list of insecure registries? A. The file that stores insecure registry list is called registries.conf and it lives in the /etc/containers directory.
